isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1991) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TEST PROCEDURES FOR 7.3 LITER DIESEL ENGINES - FUEL SYSTEM PRESSURES - CHECK MECHANICAL LIFT PUMP (FUEL SUPPLY) PRESSURE. [U-HAUL APPLICATIONS ONLY].

svcproc.title: CHECK MECHANICAL LIFT PUMP (FUEL SUPPLY) PRESSURE. [U-HAUL APPLICATIONS ONLY].

note.para: U-HAUL applications differ only because they are equipped with a combination fuel filter, heater and water seperator.

step1.para: Disconnect and plug the hose from the continuous vent and attach a 0-15 psi pressure gauge at the continuous vent. Refer to Figure 5.20.
Check pressure at rated speed, no load, with the transmission in neutral.
If the pressure is not within specifications (1 psi min.) , skip Test B and perform Tests C and D.
If the pressure is not within specifications, change the fuel filter and recheck lift pump pressure. If the pressure at the fuel filter outlet remains low, perform Test B.

figure.caption: Figure 5.20 Mechanical Lift Pump (Fuel Supply) Pressure.
